mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY A.APPZN_NO DESC) AS RNUM , COUNT (1) OVER () AS TOTAL_COUNT , A.SEQ , A.APPZN_NO , A.APP_TYPE , A.APP_ORD , A.CONTENTS_TITL , A.APP_PID , A.APP_URL , A.IMG_480 , A.IMG_800 FROM TB_DP_APPZN_NEW_APP A WHERE A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.APP_TYPE = #{appType} AND A.APPZN_NO = #{appznNo} ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN #{offset} AND #{count} + #{offset} - 1 ORDER BY RNUM
